title: Corridor Connecting the Entrance/Exit for the Differently abled persons - The corridor connecting th
clause_text: Corridor Connecting the Entrance/Exit for the Differently abled persons - The corridor connecting the outdoors to a place where information concerning the overall use of the specified building can be provided to visually impaired persons either by a person or by signs, shall be provided as follows:
